mapper.select:
SELECT ovid, name, title, channelurl as channelUrl, comment, upddt as updDt FROM tb_origin_vid where 1=1
AND name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_origin_vid (ovid, name, title, channelurl, comment, regid, regdt, updid, upddt) select concat('R', lpad(cast(substring(ifnull(max(ovid), 'O000000'),2) as unsigned)+1, 6, '0')) as ovid , #{name}, #{title}, #{channelUrl}, #{comment}, #{userId}, now(), #{userId}, now() from tb_origin_vid
